overview: Relive the magic with hosts Art Linkletter, Bob Cummings and Ronald Reagan at the live opening day celebration. Broadcast on July 17, 1955 to a live audience of over 90 million people, tour every magical land in park, from the Disneyland Express to Sleeping Beauty Castle
tagline: Disneyland is dedicated to the ideals, the dreams, and the hard facts that have created America - with the hope that it will be a source of joy and inspiration to all the world.
title: Disneyland's Opening Day Broadcast
